ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: stay up at night, except a little,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Keep watch all the night except some,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Stand up in Prayer by night, all but a small part of it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: worship (God) for a few hours at night.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Stand up for worship during the night, except for some part of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Stand (to pray) all night, except a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Rise to pray in the night except a little,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: keep vigil the night, except a little
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Keep vigil the night long, save a little -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: stand up to pray for much of the night.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Stay up the night long save a little -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Stand vigil through the night, except for a little [of it],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Stand (to prayer) by night, but not all night,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Stand (to pray) all night, except a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: rise (to pray) the night except a little;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Stay up during the night, except a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:2] Stand vigil, perform prayer, through the night, except a little,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Keep vigil the night long) in prayer, then He said (save a little);
